periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Patchy Fog
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8pm, then patchy fog. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. North northwest wind 2 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

periods.name: Monday
periods.shortForecast: Patchy Fog then Slight Chance Rain Showers
periods.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 7am, then a slight chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Clear
